cast.name: Reaper M. Jones Reaper M. Jones
John Cory Stringer John Cory Stringer
Alex Del Monacco Alex Del Monacco

introduction: "Santa Claus Versus the Zombies" tells the story of a suburban family that finds themselves barricaded in their house following the outbreak of the Zombie plague. Along for the ride are a couple of elves and an actor that just might be the real Santa Claus. In the meantime, the President and his military advisers are holed up in a bunker feverishly trying to hatch a plan to rescue Santa and the desperate family.This is a story of an average suburban family enjoying the holidays. Unbeknownst to them, a Zombie Plague has taken hold of the country and threaten to destroy civilizations as we know it.They now find themselves barricaded in their own home fighting for survival. along for the ride are a couple of elves and an actor who just might be the real Santa Claus.The President and his advisors work feverishly to hatch a plan to rescue Santa and save Christmas for all mankind. That is, if they can survive. will Santa's powers be enough to fight the Zombies?This latest offering from George Bonilla and ZP International is a family friendly thrill ride that mixes equal parts laughs, scares, and action.
